name: SIGMATA: Repeat the Signal
description:
SIGMATA: Repeat the Signal is the official companion to SIGMATA: This Signal Kills Fascists (Winner of Ennies 2019 Judges' Spotlight Award). This product dramatically improves the core SIGMATA experience, effectively upgrading it to a 2nd edition. It features the following enhancements:

  • Major overhaul to core mechanics and character rules to make for more varied play and more dynamic characters.
  • Ability to play a human Partisan who fights alongside Receivers, who have their own set of advantages (e.g. they don't rely on the Signal to use their best abilities) and disadvantages (e.g. they cannot reboot)
  • Guidance and templates for creating your own factions for the core 1980s setting.
  • Guidance and templates to create your own SIGMATA hack, including editable character sheets, scene sheets, and War Room sheet. The new refinements to the game make it much easier to hack.
  • Strong relationship mechanics, as seen in AIRLOCK, which make for exciting inter-character drama.
  • Major rules overhaul and new sheets for scenes of combat, evasion, and intrigue.
  • Rules for using Evasion scenes to replicate car chases and survival horror.
  • Rules for using Intrigue scenes to replicate strategic montages, arguments between player characters, and crime scene investigations.
  • Major overhaul of the War Room sheet adds more dynamism and danger to campaigns.
  • New "Block Wars" rules and sheets as an alternative to way to run your campaign and a means to better tie your campaign's events in a sense of time and place.
  • And more...

Requires "SIGMATA: This Signal Kills Fascists" to play.

Content Warning: Explicit language.

Accessibility Warning: Unfortunately, this product is not well optimized for low-visibility customers at this time.
